alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 1:59PM PST until March 10 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 6500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches with the highest amounts above 7000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 75 mph. * WHERE...Humboldt County and Northern Elko County. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
